title: geth not getting more blocks
body:
Geth
Version: 0.9.31
Git Commit: dfd18d245af37344f8e6fadca55f22a639d7f1ba
Protocol Version: 60
Network Id: 0
Go Version: go1.4.2

(The behavior is looking like cpp issue https://github.com/ethereum/cpp-ethereum/issues/2162)

Could you try the latest develop? We've fixed two lockups in the downloader, as well as polish the propagation/announcement based block synchronization, so there should be much fewer issues in this aspect.
